title: Appointments
description: Schema for managing appointments and preferences for damp and mould inspections in compliance with HACT UK Housing Data Standards.

request_appointment.description: A request made to book an appointment linked to either a work order or an investigation.

request_appointment_id.description: Unique identifier for the appointment request.

work_order_id.description: Identifier for the work order (if applicable).

requested_date.description: Date the appointment was requested for.

requested_time_start.description: Requested start time of the appointment.

requested_time_end.description: Requested end time of the appointment.

notes.description: Optional notes provided with the appointment request.

request_appointment_response.description: Response to an appointment request, indicating status and details.

request_appointment_response_id.description: Unique identifier for the appointment response.

request_appointment_id.description: Foreign key to the original appointment request.

response_status.description: Status of the response (e.g., ACCEPT, REJECT).

response_date.description: Timestamp when the response was made.

request_available_appointments.description: A request to fetch a list of available appointment slots for either a work order or investigation.

request_available_appointments_id.description: Unique identifier for the available appointments request.

requested_from_date.description: Start of the requested availability window.

requested_to_date.description: End of the requested availability window.

available_appointment.description: Details of an available appointment slot in response to a request.

available_appointment_id.description: Unique identifier for the available appointment slot.

request_available_appointments_id.description: ID of the request that this availability is responding to.

available_time_start.description: Start time of the available appointment.

available_time_end.description: End time of the available appointment.

request_additional_work_approval.description: Request for approval of additional work beyond the scope of the initial appointment.

request_additional_work_approval_id.description: Unique ID for the additional work approval request.

approval_status.description: Status of the approval request (e.g., APPROVED, DENIED).

approval_date.description: Date the approval was made, if applicable.

notes.description: Additional notes for the approval request.

customer_appointment_preference_id.description: Unique ID for the preference record.

specific_date.description: Specific date requested by the tenant.

notes.description: Free-text notes about the tenant's preferences.

customer_appointment_preference_day_of_w.description: Link table to capture tenant preferences on specific days of the week.

days_of_week_code_id.description: Foreign key to a predefined code representing a day of the week.
